title: Southern Campus professor selected as 2015-16 COIL Fellow (Ohio University)
text: ( Source : Ohio University ) Oct 13 , 2015 By Traci Tillis IRONTON, Ohio - Ohio University Southern Assistant Professor of Communication Studies Purba Das was recently selected as one of only five Ohio University Regional Higher Education
